subtitles.transcript: Another man said, “You and I have been friendly for 30 years. But you refuse to give my woman [an intravenous] drip?
I said, “We are friendly for 30 years, but please …
that disease, that condition, it’s not part of it [our friendship].”
Later on, after his woman passed away, [along] with his daughter, he came back to me

He said, “I’m too sorry. 
I never knew that condition was that [Ebola].”
